name: kitsu
description: Promise based NodeJS API wrapper for Kitsu.io
author: James Harris <wopian@wopian.me>

scripts.docs: documentation build src/index.js -f md -o DOCS.md --sort-order source
scripts.build: yarn run docs && yarn run rollup && yarn run uglify
scripts.release:push: git push origin && git push origin --tags && git stash pop
scripts.release:commit: git add package.json && git add DOCS.md && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "build: bump version" && git stash
scripts.release:major: yarn run release:build && changelog -M && yarn run release:commit && npm version major && yarn run release:push
scripts.release:minor: yarn run release:build && changelog -m && yarn run release:commit && npm version minor && yarn run release:push
scripts.release:patch: yarn run release:build && changelog -p && yarn run release:commit && npm version patch && yarn run release:push
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs lib/kitsu.js -c -m -o lib/kitsu.js && uglifyjs lib/kitsu.mjs -c -m -o lib/kitsu.mjs
